name: Mini Tanks (squiggy)
description:
WARNING !!

This game runs extremely slow in Firefox, try to use a different browser!

Tanks minigame made in p5js for my Interactive Computing Final.

  • Music/SFX made in Famitracker 0CC
  • Visuals drawn in Aseprite.
  • Levels created in Tiled.
  • With inspiration from the Wii Play tanks minigame.

There may be some bugs!
